abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column holds that as Tiger Woods continues to struggle to revive his game, youngsters Rickie Fowler and Bud Cauley are turning in performances that are worthy of attention.
snippet: As Tiger Woods continued to struggle to get his game back, Rickie Fowler 22, and Bud Cauley, 21, turned in performances this weekend that were worthy of attention.
lead_paragraph: As Tiger Woods continued to struggle to get his game back, Rickie Fowler 22, and Bud Cauley, 21, turned in performances this weekend that were worthy of attention.

headline.main: Young and Unawed by Woods’s Shadow
headline.print_headline: Young and Unawed by Woods’s Shadow
headline.seo: Fowler and Cauley Unawed by Woods’s Shadow
